mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT 'User' AS Type , GM.UserCode AS Code , UR.DisplayName AS CodeName , UR.MailAddress , GM.GroupMemberID AS MemberID FROM sys_object_group_member AS GM LEFT JOIN sys_object_user AS UR ON GM.UserCode = UR.UserCode WHERE GM.GroupCode = 'EAccounting_Executive' AND GM.UserCode = #{UR_Code} UNION SELECT 'Dept' AS Type , GM.MemberGroupCode AS Code , GR.DisplayName AS CodeName , GR.PrimaryMail , GM.MemberGroupID AS MemberID FROM sys_object_group_membergroup AS GM LEFT JOIN sys_object_group AS GR ON GM.MemberGroupCode = GR.GroupCode WHERE GM.GroupCode = 'EAccounting_Executive' AND GM.MemberGroupCode = #{DeptID} ) AS A

SELECT ifnull(sum(a.CorpCardAmount),0)+ifnull(SUM(a.TaxBillAmount),0)+ ifnull(SUM(a.ReceiptAmount),0) TotalAmount , ifnull(sum(a.CorpCardAmount),0) CorpCardAmount, ifnull(SUM(a.CorpCardCnt),0) CorpCardCnt , ifnull(SUM(a.TaxBillAmount),0) TaxBillAmount, ifnull(SUM(a.TaxBillCnt),0) TaxBillCnt , ifnull(SUM(a.ReceiptAmount),0) ReceiptAmount, ifnull(SUM(a.ReceiptCnt),0) ReceiptCnt FROM ( SELECT sum(acr.AMOUNTWON) CorpCardAmount, COUNT(acr.ReceiptID) CorpCardCnt, 0 TaxBillAmount, 0 TaxBillCnt, 0 ReceiptAmount, 0 ReceiptCnt FROM covi_account4j_si.act_card_receipt acr JOIN covi_account4j_si.ACT_CORP_CARD acc ON ACR.CARDNO = ACC.CardNo WHERE acr.APPROVEDATE LIKE CONCAT(#{payDate},'%') AND ACC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code} UNION ALL SELECT 0, 0, SUM(ati.TOTALAMOUNT) TaxBillAmount, COUNT(ati.TaxInvoiceID) TaxBillCnt, 0, 0 FROM covi_account4j_si.ACT_TAXINVOICE ati WHERE WRITEDATE LIKE CONCAT(#{payDate},'%') AND DataIndex IN ('BUY','AP') AND ( InvoiceeEmail1 IN ( SELECT AM.TaxMailAddress FROM covi_account4j_si.act_manager AM WHERE AM.ManagerUserCode = #{UR_Code} UNION SELECT sou.MailAddress FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user SOU WHERE SOU.UserCode = #{UR_Code} ) OR TossUserCode =#{UR_Code} ) UNION ALL SELECT 0,0,0,0, SUM(ar.TOTALAMOUNT) ReceiptAmount, COUNT(ar.ReceiptID) ReceiptCnt FROM covi_account4j_si.ACT_RECEIPT ar WHERE ar.USEDATE between STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{payDate},'01'),'%Y%m%d') AND LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{payDate},'01'),'%Y%m%d')) AND ar.RegisterID = #{UR_Code}) A

SELECT Code, Name, Cnt, Amount FROM (SELECT IFNULL(Code,'Total') Code, Name,COUNT(*) Cnt, SUM(Amount) Amount , case when A.Code IS null then 0 ELSE 1 END Ord FROM ( SELECT
AEAD.StandardBriefID Code, sb.StandardBriefName Name
AEAD.AccountCode Code, c.AccountName Name
, 1 , CASE WHEN (AEAL.ProofCode = 'TaxBill' AND AEAD.Amount != AEAL.TotalAmount) THEN AEAD.Amount + AEAL.TaxAmount ELSE AEAD.Amount END AS Amount FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD on AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON AEAD.AccountCode = c.AccountCode
INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief sb ON c.AccountID = sb.AccountID AND AEAD.StandardBriefID = sb.StandardBriefID
WHERE ProofDate LIKE CONCAT(#{payDate},'%') AND AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code} AND AEA.ApplicationStatus in ('S','D','P','DC','E') AND AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND c.CompanyCode= #{companyCode} ) A GROUP BY A.Code with ROLLUP) aa ORDER BY Ord, Amount DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE C.UserCode = #{UR_Code} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = #{state} #진행:288/완료:528 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL

SELECT A.ProcessID , B.WorkItemID , C.PerformerID , A.InitiatorID , A.InitiatorName , A.InitiatorUnitID , A.InitiatorUnitName , C.UserCode , C.UserName , C.SubKind , C.SubKind AS FormSubKind , B.Created , B.TaskID , FormSubject , DATE_FORMAT(B.Created,'%m-%d %H:%i') Created , B.TaskID , U.PhotoPath FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID LEFT OUTER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.sys_object_user AS U ON U.UserCode = A.InitiatorID WHERE C.UserCode = #{UR_Code} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = #{state} #진행:288/완료:528 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY A.EndDate desc LIMIT 3

SELECT AEA.ExpenceApplicationID , AEA.CompanyCode , AEA.ApplicationTitle , AEA.ApplicationType , AEA.ApplicationStatus , AEA.RegisterID , USR.DisplayName RegisterName , AEA.ProcessID
, DATE_FORMAT( IFNULL(AEA.ApplicationDate, AEA.RegistDate), '%m-%d %H:%i') AS ApplicationDate , AEA.RequestType , AEA.RegistDate , AEA.ChargeJob
, AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID , AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID cdRownum , DATE_FORMAT( AEAL.ProofDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS ProofDate , DATE_FORMAT( AEAL.PostingDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS PostingDate , AEAL.ProofCode
, AEAL.CardUID , AEAL.CashUID , AEAL.TaxUID , AEAL.TaxType , AEAL.TaxCode , AEAL.PayAdjustMethod , AEAL.PayMethod , AEAL.IsWithholdingTax , AEAL.IncomeTax , AEAL.LocalTax , AEAL.PayDate , AEAL.VendorNo , AEAL.TotalAmount , CASE WHEN (AEAL.ProofCode = 'TaxBill' AND AEAD.Amount != AEAL.TotalAmount) THEN AEAD.Amount + AEAL.TaxAmount ELSE AEAD.Amount END AS Amount , AEAD.AccountCode , c.AccountName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON AEAD.AccountCode = c.AccountCode LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user USR ON AEA.RegisterID = USR.UserCode WHERE AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code} AND AEA.Active = 'N' AND AEAL.ProofCode = #{proofCode} limit 4

SELECT AR.ReceiptID, AR.CompanyCode, AR.ExpenceMgmtCode, AR.UsageText, AR.PhotoDate AS PhotoDate, AR.PhotoDate AS PhotoDateStr, AR.ReceiptType, AR.ReceiptFileID, AR.Active, covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('Active', AR.Active,'ALL') AS ActiveName, AR.RegisterID, DATE_FORMAT(AR.RegistDate, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS RegistDate, concat(REPLACE(ST.FilePath,'{0}',SF.CompanyCode), SF.FilePath , SF.SavedName) URLPath
,ar.StandardBriefID Code, sb.StandardBriefName Name
,ar.AccountCode Code, c.AccountName Name
FROM covi_account4j_si.act_receipt AR LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_file SF ON ar.ReceiptFileID = sf.fileid LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_storage ST ON ST.StorageID = SF.StorageID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON AR.AccountCode = c.AccountCode AND c.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief sb ON ar.StandardBriefID = sb.StandardBriefID
WHERE AR.RegistDate between STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{payDate},'01'),'%Y%m%d') AND LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{payDate},'01'),'%Y%m%d')) AND AR.RegisterID = #{UR_Code} AND AR.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} ORDER BY AR.ReceiptID DESC limit 5

SELECT count(ACR.ReceiptID) FROM covi_account4j_si.act_card_receipt ACR LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card ACC ON ACR.CardNo = ACC.CardNo WHERE ( (IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND ACC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code} ) OR (ACR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code} ) OR (ACC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code} ) ) OR ('' != '' AND ACR.CardNo = '' AND '' != '' AND ACR.ApproveNo= '') ) AND ACR.InfoIndex = 'A' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.IsPersonalUse,''),'N') = 'N' AND ACR.CardUserCode = #{UR_Code} AND ACR.Active = 'N' AND ACC.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}

SELECT acr.ApproveNo, ACR.ReceiptID, CASE WHEN (ACR.Class = 'B' OR ACR.InfoIndex = 'C') AND AmountWon > 0 THEN FORMAT((ACR.AmountWon*-1),0) ELSE FORMAT(ACR.AmountWon,0) END AS AmountWon , ACR.StoreName , CASE WHEN ACR.InfoIndex = 'A' THEN CASE WHEN IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.ApproveDate,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' THEN '' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(ACR.ApproveDate, '%Y.%m.%d') END ELSE CASE WHEN IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.UseDate,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' THEN '' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(ACR.UseDate, '%Y.%m.%d') END END AS ApproveDate , TIME_FORMAT(ACR.ApproveTime, '%H:%i:%s') AS ApproveTime
,acr.StandardBriefID Code, sb.StandardBriefName Name
,acr.AccountCode Code, c.AccountName Name
FROM covi_account4j_si.act_card_receipt ACR LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card ACC ON ACR.CardNo = ACC.CardNo LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON acr.AccountCode = c.AccountCode AND c.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief sb ON acr.StandardBriefID = sb.StandardBriefID
WHERE ( (IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND ACC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code} ) OR (ACR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code} ) OR (ACC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code} ) ) OR ('' != '' AND ACR.CardNo = '' AND '' != '' AND ACR.ApproveNo= '') ) AND ACR.InfoIndex = 'A' AND IFNULL(NULLIF(ACR.IsPersonalUse,''),'N') = 'N' AND ACR.CardUserCode = #{UR_Code} AND ACR.Active = 'N' AND ACC.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} ORDER BY ApproveDate desc LIMIT 3

SELECT count(ACI.TaxInvoiceID) FROM covi_account4j_si.act_taxinvoice ACI WHERE ACI.DataIndex = 'BUY' AND ( CASE WHEN ACI.IsOffset = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN ACI.IsOffset = 'A' OR ACI.ApproveStatus = 'I' THEN 'A' WHEN ACI.ApproveStatus = 'Y' THEN 'T' WHEN ACI.ApproveStatus = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'R' END ) = 'N' AND ( ACI.InvoiceeEmail1 IN ( SELECT AM.TaxMailAddress FROM covi_account4j_si.act_manager AM WHERE AM.ManagerUserCode = #{UR_Code} UNION SELECT SOU.MailAddress FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user SOU WHERE SOU.UserCode = #{UR_Code} ) OR ACI.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM covi_account4j_si.act_manager X WHERE X.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND X.TaxMailAddress = ACI.InvoiceeEmail1 )

SELECT ACI.TaxInvoiceID , DATE_FORMAT(ACI.WriteDate,'%Y.%m.%d') AS WriteDate , ACI.InvoicerCorpName , FORMAT(ACI.TotalAmount,0) AS TotalAmount FROM covi_account4j_si.act_taxinvoice ACI WHERE ACI.DataIndex = 'BUY' AND ( CASE WHEN ACI.IsOffset = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN ACI.IsOffset = 'A' OR ACI.ApproveStatus = 'I' THEN 'A' WHEN ACI.ApproveStatus = 'Y' THEN 'T' WHEN ACI.ApproveStatus = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'R' END ) = 'N' AND ( ACI.InvoiceeEmail1 IN ( SELECT AM.TaxMailAddress FROM covi_account4j_si.act_manager AM WHERE AM.ManagerUserCode = #{UR_Code} UNION SELECT SOU.MailAddress FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user SOU WHERE SOU.UserCode = #{UR_Code} ) OR ACI.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM covi_account4j_si.act_manager X WHERE X.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND X.TaxMailAddress = ACI.InvoiceeEmail1 ) ORDER BY WriteDate desc LIMIT 3
